body: mutation {createcustomernote ( customernote: {id: "21d1863b-abd5-430d-9498-72a822c39bf4", customer: "24f7c851-29d4-4af9-87c5-0298fa74c689", user: "super.user@test.com", body: "This is a really fun test of a really fun create query that is so much fun!"} ) {id, customer {id, email, firstname, lastname, phone, address {line1, city, state, zip, country}}, user {id, name, auth0_id, active}, account, body, created_at, updated_at}}
